oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Always: Singing The Legacy Of Patsy Cline - 2013-05-11
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance honoring the music and legacy of Patsy Cline from the Ford Theater of the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on May 11, 2013. Performers include Emma Shudde; Lisa Brokop; Lorrie Morgan; Pam Tillis; Jan Howard; Kristen Kelly. This program is presented in support of the exhibit Patsy Cline: Crazy for Loving You.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Brenda Lee; Kristen Kelly; Emma Shudde; Lisa Brokop; Pam Tillis; Lorrie Morgan; Jan Howard;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Hosted by Brenda Lee. Performances include; Walking After Midnight (Kristen Kelly); Ex-Old Man (Kristen Kelly); He Loves To Make Me Cry (Kristen Kelly); I Fall To Pieces (Kristen Kelly); Reminisces Of Patsy Cline (Jan Howard); Tennessee Waltz (Emma Shudde); Sweet Dreams (Lisa Brokop); So Wrong (Pam Tillis); Leaving On Your Mind (Lorrie Morgan); Band Introductions; Mi Vida Loca (My Crazy Life) (Pam Tillis); Except For Monday (Lorrie Morgan); Strange (Pam Tillis); Back In Baby's Arms (Lorrie Morgan); I Am A Woman (Lorrie Morgan and Pam Tillis);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Cline, Patsy, 1932-1963; Lee, Brenda, 1944-; Shudde, Emma; Brokop, Lisa; Morgan, Lorrie; Tillis, Pam; Howard, Jan (Vocalist); Kelly, Kristen;
